item.title: Report E-2024100317
item.description:
Report E-2024100317

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-12T21:13:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-02
  • City: PHOENIX
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On October 2, 2024, one (1) 55-gallon drum of UN2922 was shipped with a loose bung and released approximately less than one (<1) gallon of product to the top of the drum. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from GrayMar Environmental Services (GES) to remediate the impacted site. GES personnel utilized hand tools and absorbents to remediate the UN2922-impacted drum. The crew tightened the loose bung to ensure no more product would spill. All impacted material was collected and containerized into one (1) 5-gallon bucket and staged on site for transport and disposal.
